data.title: Casa Vanna Santa Maria Coghinas
data.meta_description: Casa Vanna in Santa Maria Coghinas
data.text:
Our accommodation boasts a strategic yet peaceful location, perfect for exploring the north of Sardinia. Just a few kilometers away, you will find the most beautiful beaches on the island, such as Isola Rossa and Badesi, as well as picturesque villages like Castelsardo. Alghero, Stintino, and the Costa Smeralda are easily reachable in about an hour by car, offering a wide range of destinations to enhance your stay. Additionally, you can conveniently reach bars and grocery stores on foot.

The space, located on the first floor and accessible via two small flight of stairs, provides a well-equipped kitchen with a refrigerator, electric oven, microwave, moka pot, dishes, and cutlery. Feel free to use everything that is available. The bathroom is equipped with a shower, washing machine, hairdryer, as well as a bathroom kit with towels and shower gel/shampoo for your comfort.

Other things to keep in mind: you can safely park on the road next to the house or in the private street in front of the accommodation. Choose our accommodation for a relaxing and convenient stay, with everything you need at your fingertips.
